name: Project: Xenogene
description:
Synopsis

In the year 2047, the Genova science lab has been suffering from a leakage,  causing an outbreak of Bioserum X throughout the labs. The leakage was apparently caused by a thunderstrike which also caused the power cut. All the staffs coming in contact with the serum had become a feral bio-creature wreaking havoc in the lab.

This game was developed by a team of 5 people through the RPG Maker engine and it is our studio's first game project ever made. We are a group of college students who aim to expand our portfolio through developing our game projects and sharing our work with other people.
